post.body: haha! Outta the mouth of babes!
I feel that some of those pts are antiquated and is in some ways perpetuating master/slave interview. Which must stop I tells ya!
ha! I might try Ulysses again, though I am possibly one of the few that thinks it's a pile of tosh. As for quit smk? We'll see...
At least a drink with me!
(cont) maybe there are basics that we take for granted that others aren't aware of...
Yep - Good advice for young grads methinks. Not necc for seasoned pros who have developed their working personas... but (Cont)
Really? That would be handy indeed!
That URL isn't working re Nortel...
*expects hilarity*!
mate, it's gone. Contract filled I'm afraid :(
good luck!
Yay! Mine was 23rd Nov 2003 for 5 yrs! And I've never looked back. (Well, hardly!)
it's 60s and garage rock..
My mood suggests the Zombies & Link Cromwell & The Zoo.
Glad you liked my card mate :)
Looks like it hey?!! Oddly enough I don't drink Coopers.
Haha! Sorry I was recommended a swedish popster: http://tinyurl.com/6zfxz6
The Casanovas did a Danger Zone cover for UK rock magazine. Classic!
Actually I've changed my mind. Much different. I like.
Do you reckon Jenny Wilson sounds a bit high pitchy Elliot Smith? I keep thinking of him listening to her.
Me too Bigmac. People are good.
But doing it alone and organically seems to be the go!
I think that's a large company to be honest and I think it was an HR person who told me...
hehe. Sweet :)
ah. Good to know!
haha! Apparently someone's grandmother tweets more than I do!
thank you michael! Also, means I'll feel slightly less guilty when I go overseas on Friday!
Ha! :)
which is what I think evolutionists (and I am one to be fair) miss sometimes.
Scientists have to start where there is no rationale and then make it rational. That's pretty cool. But the how isn't the why
But anyway, good night. Just finished work. Shattered!
... only just thinks.
...shit goes down from poor rationale, war etc etc, but there's just the tiniest danger of sterilisation if everyone...
I would also say, some real beauty comes from irrational thought and behaviour. And yeah, it sucks that some major...
But how is evidence fully rational? You have to have the answer and then work the question to suit the answer. Seems flawed?
yes yes. Religion DOES suck. But 'belief' is different. And your form of atheism is just another religion without a god.
...are not as enlightened as non-believers. There are some truths in belief that you can't experience unless you do.
Er what? I would but they're dead. ha. Nah, the pt I'm making is, it's arrogant to think people who believe in something...
Further, some of the most devout ppl I know are rational and logical. I despise fundamentalism in all its forms.
Well I don't agree with that. The world did quite fine when we thought that witches existed and the earth was flat.
I hope not. Though maybe the atheist needs some representation from time to time. As argued by Richard Dawkins.
Uh oh. Ordered coffee and forgot that I haven't eaten yet. Prepare for hyper shaky Georgie!
I'm really surprised and flattered at the influx of new followers for me. Thank you, and I hope that I can say SOMETHING intelligent soon :)
Hmmm 'Lulz'? Web Schadenfraude?
http://tinyurl.com/65q9an Interview Etiquette. Hmmm. What do you think?
I think I have decided to go to China in January during recruitment lull. May or may not be a good idea but gotta see the family!
Except, just to be clear - it's not scalping!!
Alright. Twitter is NOT the right place to essentially scalp tix. Apologies.
OK. I have 2 spare tix to Meredith for the band camp. Any buyers?
Seems my direct messages aren't going thru to ppl. If you're expecting a dm from me, I have replied, but maybe email me if in doubt :)
Alright drama over. Back in business now. Phone away :)
Pal's car just got hit by truck. Going to get her. May be hard to get hold of me this afternoon.
Starting preparations on the chinese steamboat I'm cooking for 10 this evening. Panic!!
ATE TOO MUCH. Blimpy.
To be fair, I'm the loser for watching this. Georgie fail.
Really today tonight? Really?! Yes, ALL the people on the dole are lazy and can get a job 'if they want one'. Gawd.
OK - I'm suitably cheered up now. Just met @bradleybones. Just lovely.
Thanks all for your kind words :)
Anybody wanna cheer me up today? :(
Right, good night Tweeps. Tonight is NOT a computer night for me :)
Outstanding! First placement of the year today... People are happy and so am I :)
Was wondering if anyone could recommend a bookkeeper for me in Melbourne?
Interesting - just got a DM about free iPhones... This phishing stuff is full on.
4) stop being sucked in by the promise of large cardboard cheques from readers digest.
3) stop reading Seth godin blog at 3am. Jut because it arrives doesn't mean I have to notice it.
